<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Installation instructions =

== Without source code ==

	To start generating your applications without needing to access the source code, install _*imogene*_ through its update side.
	A document explaining how to install _*imogene*_ through its update side can be downloaded [http://code.google.com/p/imogene/downloads/detail?name=ImogeneInstallationViaUpdateSite.pdf&can=2&q=#makechanges here].

== With source code ==

	To get the _*imogene*_ source code and generate applications from there, install _*imogene*_ from the source.
	A document explaining how to install _*imogene*_ from the source can be downloaded [http://code.google.com/p/imogene/downloads/detail?name=ImogeneInstallationFromSources.pdf&can=2&q=#makechanges here].
	
= Start using Imogene =

	After the installation is done, find out HowToUse the studio
